## containsInvalidResponse() function

Checks to see if any of the responses within the handler has invalid XML within the SSML fields.


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function containsInvalidResponse(intent: Intent | Handler): ContainsInvalidResponseResult;
```
